mapper.sql: select DISTINCT menu.perms from menu LEFT JOIN relation_role_menu on menu.id = relation_role_menu.menu_id LEFT JOIN relation_user_role on relation_role_menu.role_id = relation_user_role.role_id LEFT JOIN role on relation_user_role.role_id = role.id
mapper.select: where role.status = '0' and role.del_flag ='0' and menu.status = '0' and relation_user_role.user_id = #{userId}
